sys_hub_trigger_instance.comment: When Netcool Creates a New Incident, create an eBond in the Remote Instance (if it is managed there)

sys_element_mapping.value: comments_and_work_notes=FD - Unable to create Remote Incident Ticket: {{86bd610c-accc-4b21-9600-fcd4bf6b71c8.__status__.message}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create an eBonded ticket - custom action, does NOT update the correlation ID field (needs to remain as provided by Netcool)

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: For the purposes of testing, using the "Can Print" boolean, but would be dbunity2 true/false boolean indicator
